threads: .⁦@AOC⁩ is it a “crime against humanity” when ⁦@POTUS⁩ secretly flies migrants into Westchester (the place you grew up)? The crime here is allowing the continued flow of illegal immigration, human trafficking and drugs. It has to stop!
text: man, i can't believe this shit again. another liberal elitist ignoring the real issues. aoc, it's not a crime against humanity when trump flies migrants to westchester. it's a crime against humanity that you ignore the chaos caused by open borders. focus on securing our country, not playing politics.
